enhanced_description: Medi Assist is India's leading HealthTech and InsurTech company, specializing in the administration of health benefits for employers, retail members, and public health schemes. Their health benefits administration model includes a modular claims management system, technology for data-driven decisions, and customer-centric service solutions, all aimed at lowering healthcare costs and improving employee happiness and engagement. Key features include Benefits Management, Annual Health Checks, and Occupational Health Checks. The platform provides tools for members to plan hospitalization with pre-authorization (48 hours prior), submit and track reimbursement claims online in real-time to reduce settlement wait times, and find nearby network hospitals. Their approach blends talent and technology for claims analysis to help members defy national claim cost trends and make informed healthcare decisions.
